detail.app_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, German, Spanish, French, Korean, Italian, Portuguese, Thai, Traditional Chinese
detail.app_release_note:
v2.2.93 Update

Visual Updates:

* New revamped and optimised shaders for all ranges
* Higher resolution textures for all ranges
* Optimised weapon and attachment shaders 
* Higher Resolution textures for weapons and attachments
* Full Linear color space conversion for closer-to-real-world color accuracy
* New shaders blend the light from muzzle flashes into the surrounding area
* New shaders allow for runtime color & fog modifications

Audio Updates:

* Total rework of all weapon sounds (Unique firing sounds for every weapon)
* New per-weapon sounds categories added (Dry Firing, Firemode Cycling, Inserting Rounds, Revolver Cylinder)
* Added multiple volume options (Master, Music, SFX, Weapon & UI)

Gameplay Updates:

* New onboarding sequence that allows players to experiment with options before continuing into the main tutorial.
* Improved two-handed weapon handling.
* New option to disable Muzzle Flashes.
detail.app_supported_platforms: PICO Neo3 Pro, PICO Neo3 Eye, PICO Neo3, PICO 4, PICO 4 Pro
